title: National Math Olympiad
description: A challenging competition for math enthusiasts to test their problem-solving skills.

title: International Science Olympiad
description: Compete in an international-level science contest covering physics, chemistry, and biology.

title: English Proficiency Olympiad
description: A language-based competition to enhance vocabulary, grammar, and comprehension skills.

title: Coding & Cyber Olympiad
description: Test your programming and cybersecurity knowledge in this national-level contest.

title: GK & Current Affairs Olympiad
description: A knowledge-based test on current events, history, geography, and politics.

title: Aptitude & Logical Reasoning Olympiad
description: A test of analytical, reasoning, and problem-solving abilities for students.

title: National Robotics Olympiad
description: A robotics challenge where students showcase their innovative automation solutions.

title: Eco Awareness Olympiad
description: A sustainability-focused competition on climate change and environmental conservation.
